Method Detail

getComponentInstance

public java.lang.Object getComponentInstance()
Description copied from interface: ComponentStrategy
This method will return an instance (concrete or hollow) of the component. The component instance indentity is implementation dependent.

Only the following is true of the returned component instance:

  • The returned component instance will be of the registered component type.
  • Method invocations on the returned component instance will be completed successfully provided an implementation was registered prior to the method invocation.

    The advantage of using this method is that an instance of the component may be obtained even prior to registering an implementation for the component.

    • isDispatching

    public boolean isDispatching()
    Returns:
    true If this state is a dispatching state, false otherwise.
